alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Giles; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 11:56AM CDT until August 12 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Giles County in Middle Tennessee... Western Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1155 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Franklin to Mount Pleasant, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Columbia, Shelbyville, Lewisburg, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, Thompson`s Station, Chapel Hill, Cornersville, Eagleville, Lynnville, Christiana, Culleoka, I-65 East Of Columbia, Triune, Fosterville, Rover, Belfast and Deason. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 25 and 63. Interstate 24 between mile markers 81 and 90. Interstate 840 between mile markers 21 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Giles; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson
